app.name: Between us Drivers
app.slogan: The only way to discuss traffic problems

generic.internal-error: Oops, this is an error. We are sorry.

sign-in.email-reset-description: Enter your email and we will send you a reset link
sign-in.sign-up-create-account-message: Are you using this web without a driving license? You cannot use full potential of this web.
sign-in.auth-not-verified: We are sorry but we can continue once you activate your account. Check email for the instructions.
sign-in.reset-success: Please check your email for instructions on how to reset your password!
sign-in.reset-error: There was a problem sending a reset link to the email provided, please try again.
sign-in.obsolete-password: Password has been changed. Please log in again.

sign-up.heading: Sign up
sign-up.body: You are the single step away from registration. Enter statistical information you want to share. Your votes are anonymous in each poll.
sign-up.email-exists: This email is already used, try to login or reset your password
sign-up.password-hint: At least 6 chars, generated password is the best
sign-up.password-required: Password with at least 6 characters is required
sign-up.nickname-exists: Sorry, this nickname has already been taken
sign-up.nickname-required: Nickname long at least 3 characters is required
sign-up.consent-missing: We cannot continue without your consent
sign-up.notifications-label: I want to recieve email notifications
sign-up.personal-data: I want to enter my personal information now
sign-up.something-went-wrong: Something wen't wrong, please try again
sign-up.success-message: All set, please check your email and verify your account!
sign-up.verify-running: Thanks, we're just verifying that for you, hold tight...
sign-up.verify-error: Sorry, we couldn't verify that account, please try again or contact support.

poll.your-say: What do you want to say about it

profile.terms: I agree with terms and conditions
profile.processing: I agree with processing of my personal data
profile.user-not-found: We are sorry but this driver is unknown to us
